ReportHeaderText: Laku Pandai Agent Registration Approval Reports
Query:
SELECT BC.BRANCHNAME, 
    			BC.BRANCHCODE,  
    			P.PARTNERCODE AGENTCODE,
				P.TRADENAME AGENTNAME, 
				P.CREATEDBY CREATEDBY,
				TO_CHAR(SM.CREATETIME , 'DD/MM/YYYY') CREATEDDATE,
				TO_CHAR(SM.CREATETIME , 'HH24:MI') CREATEDTIME,
				S.APPROVEDORREJECTEDBY APPROVEDBY,
				TO_CHAR(S.APPROVEORREJECTTIME , 'DD/MM/YYYY') APPROVEREJECTDATE,
				TO_CHAR(S.APPROVEORREJECTTIME , 'HH24:MI') APPROVEREJECTTIME
				FROM 
					SUBSCRIBER S,
					SUBSCRIBER_MDN SM,
					BRANCHCODES BC,
					PARTNER P,
					MFINO_USER MU,
					ENUM_TEXT ET
				WHERE
					S.ID = SM.SUBSCRIBERID
					AND MU.USERNAME = SM.UPDATEDBY
					AND BC.ID = MU.BRANCHCODEID
					AND ET.TAGID='6216'
					AND ET.ENUMCODE = 2
					AND S.UPGRADESTATE = 2
					AND P.SUBSCRIBERID = SM.SUBSCRIBERID
					AND P.CREATETIME >= ${StartTime}
					AND P.CREATETIME <= ${EndTime};
